author: Reuters
title: Facebook commits $100 million to support news media hurt by the virus crisis
description: Facebook pledged $100 million in financing and ad spending to support news organizations, including local publishers in the U.S., reeling from pressure due to the coronavirus pandemic.
content:
Facebook on Monday pledged $100 million in financing and advertising spending to support news organizations, including local publishers in the United States, reeling from pressure due to the coronavirus pandemic.
News publishers, especially print media, have… [+951 chars]
